entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
